toolkit.title: Toolkit
toolkit.text: I am constantly improving and dedicating myself to studies in different areas of coding. I believe it is important to always be up to date and seek new knowledge to evolve in your career and grow professionally. Furthermore, I am always looking for new learning opportunities, courses, training, events and experiences that can add value to my knowledge and skills. Among the areas in which I dedicate myself with enthusiasm and interest are:
